Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameModel

  • public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameModel()
      This class handles the "heavy lifting" of word logic for the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameModel

        public GameModel()
        This class handles the "heavy lifting" of word logic for the game. The constructor creates a char[] for guessed letters, then loads the needed words to a String[] via the # class.

    • Method Detail

      • addNewGuessedLetterToArray

        public void addNewGuessedLetterToArray(char guessedLetter)
        Adds the given char to a char[], designed to keep track of what letters have been guessed.
        Parameters:
        guessedLetter - The letter to guess (char).

      • checkIfLetterAlreadyGuessed

        public boolean checkIfLetterAlreadyGuessed(char guessedLetter)
        Takes the given char and checks to see if it is contained within the char[] of already guessed letters.
        Parameters:
        guessedLetter - The letter to check (char)
        Returns:
        isLetterGuessedAlready Where the letter is guessed or not.

      • getVisible

        public java.lang.String getVisible()
        This method returns what the user is allowed to see.

      • setVisible

        public void setVisible()
        This method is used to replace the visible characters of the question word with asterisks for display to the user via getVisible().

      • getHidden

        public java.lang.String getHidden()
        This method gets the word to guess from the String array of pirate words.
        Returns:
        The word to guess.

      • guessLeft

        public int guessLeft()
        This method tells the user how many guesses are left. If the number of guesses is less than zero, it sets it to zero.
        Returns:
        Number of guesses left.

      • getLetters

        public java.lang.String getLetters()
        This method returns the letters that have already been guessed.

      • tryThis

        public boolean tryThis(char letter)
        This method sees if the letter is in the words. If it is it updates what the user can see (visible). If not it removes a guess.
        Parameters:
        letter - the letter to try
        Returns:
        correctLetterGuess whether there is winner

      • tryWord

        public boolean tryWord(java.lang.String guess)
        This method sees if the word guess is correct. If it is it updates what the user can see (visible). If not it removes 5 guesses.
        Parameters:
        guess - the word to guess
        Returns:
        correctWordGuess whether there is winner

      • checkIfPlayerHasWon

        public boolean checkIfPlayerHasWon()
        This method checks to see if the currently visible letters match the question string, which means the player has won the game.
        Returns:
        hasPlayerWonTheGame Returns true if the visibleWord and questionWord match.

      • getQuestionWord

        public java.lang.String getQuestionWord()
        Used to display the correct word if the player loses the game.
        Returns:
        questionWord The correct word.

      • setQuestionWord

        public void setQuestionWord(java.lang.String questionWord)
        Sets the question word.
        Parameters:
        questionWord -
